data.eml:eml: A revision of Tripanda and Tenerva (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kment, Petr, Jindra, Zden Ě K (2009): A revision of Tripanda and Tenerva (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae). Zootaxa 1978: 1-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185209
